sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"发现"之意。
means: discover ： 普通用词，指发现本来存在，但示被认识的事物、真理或情况。
find ： 普通用词，可指偶然发现，也可指经过寻找后得到或重新获得已失去的东西。强调动作的结果。
detect ： 正式用词，强调经过周密观察或研究而有所获得和发现，尤指发现有意隐藏之物。
ascertain ： 较正式用词，指有意搜寻与发现。

sentence.Network_en: It can be difficult to ascertain the facts.
sentence.Network_cn: 可能难以查明事实真相。

sentence.Network_en: I'm going to ascertain the truth.
It's difficult to ascertain the coal deposits.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... arduous 艰巨的; 努力的 ascertain 查明, 确定 aspect 样子; (问题等的)方面.
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... arduous 艰巨的; 努力的 ascertain 查明, 确定 aspect 样子; (问题等的)方面.
2013考研英语核心词汇_百度文库 ... ascend 登高， （渐渐）上升，升高 ascertain 查明，弄清，确定 ashamed 惭愧的，羞耻的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... centain 肯定的 ascertain 确定，发现 certify 证明；保证.

list.abs: ascertain 确定ascertainment error 确定性误差ascertainment 确定
ascertaining type decision 确定型决策ascertainment error 断定误差aschaffite 英云斜煌岩
ascertain 查明ascertained weight 确定的重量ascertaining the ship's position 定船位
ascertain 判明ascertain facts 查清-
ascent curve 上升曲线ascertain loss 确定损失ascertain the responsibility 判明责任

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the sense 'assure, convince'): from Old French acertener, based on Latin certus 'settled, sure'

entry.tran: （尤指经过努力后）查明，弄清，确定
entry.def: If you ascertain the truth about something, you find out what it is, especially by making a deliberate effort to do so.

example.ex: Through doing this, the teacher will be able to ascertain the extent to which the child understands what he is reading...
example.tran: 这样一来，老师就能确定孩子们对他所读的内容理解多少了。

example.ex: Once they had ascertained that he was not a spy, they agreed to release him...
example.tran: 一旦确认他并非间谍，他们即同意将他释放。

means.word_mean: 1. after a calculation, investigation, experiment, survey, or study;

sentences.sentence: "The physicist who found the elusive particle won the Nobel Prize"

means.word_mean: 2. be careful or certain to do something; make certain of something;

sentences.sentence: "He verified that the valves were closed"

means.word_mean: 3. find out, learn, or determine with certainty, usually by making an inquiry or other effort;

sentences.sentence: "I want to see whether she speaks French"
"Check whether the train leaves on time"

auth_sentence.content: It is , of course, difficult to ascertain which.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is , of course, difficult to ascertain which.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is , of course, difficult to ascertain which.

auth_sentence.content: BP's investigation was unable to ascertain the cause of ignition.
auth_sentence.res_content: BP's investigation was unable to ascertain the cause of ignition.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: BP's investigation was unable to ascertain the cause of ignition.

auth_sentence.content: Today's assignation: walk to pond, ascertain beaver dam.
auth_sentence.res_content: Today's assignation: walk to pond, ascertain beaver dam.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Today's assignation: walk to pond, ascertain beaver dam.

stems_affixes.word_buile: cert搞清,区别+ain表示形容词→搞清楚的→肯定的
certain[adj.肯定的]+ty表名词→n.必然,肯定;必然的事
cert搞清,区别+itude状态→确定状态
con共同+cert搞清,区别→一致,和谐→音乐会
cert搞清,区别+ify表动词→搞清楚→证明

means.word_mean: 弄清, 确定, 查明

sentences.en: I ascertained that she was dead.

jushi.english: The detective tried to ascertain the facts about the robbery.
jushi.chinese: 侦探试图查明这起抢劫案的真相。

jushi.english: The previously unidentified objects have now been definitely ascertained as being satellites.
jushi.chinese: 原来所说的不明飞行物现在已证实是卫星。

jushi.english: The insurance adjustor had to ascertain the exact value of the missing jewels.
jushi.chinese: 这个保险金估算人必须核实这些丢失的珠宝的价值。
